languages.text: {n}Среди {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментаций{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} в глаза бросается чудовищно изуродованный оплавленный {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}, соединенный с его головой. Удивительно, что он все еще работает. И вдвойне удивительно, что техножрец не заменил его — какое непредсказуемое влияние может оказывать этот искалеченный имплант на его разум?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Среди аугментаций техножреца в глаза бросается чудовищно изуродованный оплавленный когитатор, соединенный с его головой. Удивительно, что он все еще работает. И вдвойне удивительно, что техножрец не заменил его — какое непредсказуемое влияние может оказывать этот искалеченный имплант на его разум?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Среди {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментаций{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножреца{/g} в глаза бросается чудовищно изуродованный оплавленный {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}, соединенный с его головой. Удивительно, что он все еще работает. И вдвойне удивительно, что техножрец не заменил его — какое непредсказуемое влияние может оказывать этот искалеченный имплант на его разум?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}What stands out among the augmetics is the horribly melted, deformed cogitator connected to the Tech-Priest's head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on one's mind?{/n}

{n}What stands out among the augmetics is the horribly melted, deformed cogitator connected to the Tech-Priest's head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on one's mind?{/n}

How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

{n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

languages.text: {n}数々の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強措置{/g}の中でも目立つのは、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の頭とつながっている、激しく溶けて変形した{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}だ。どのように動いているかは分からない。技術司祭が交換しないというのもまた謎だ。この壊れた埋設物がどんな影響を引き起こすと考えているのだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数々の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強措置{/g}の中でも目立つのは、{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}の頭とつながっている、激しく溶けて変形した{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}だ。どのように動いているかは分からない。技術司祭が交換しないというのもまた謎だ。この壊れた埋設物がどんな影響を引き起こすと考えているのだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}在各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}中，最引人注目的，是一台已经严重熔化变形的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}，连接在这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}的头部。它的工作原理令人费解，更让人倍感困惑的是，这台沉思者依然没被换掉。这件早已毁坏的植入物，会对他的思维产生何种不可预知的影响？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}中，最引人注目的，是一台已经严重熔化变形的{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}，连接在这位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}的头部。它的工作原理令人费解，更让人倍感困惑的是，这台思考器依然没被换掉。这件早已毁坏的植入物，会对他的思维产生何种不可预知的影响？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entre los muchos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g}, lo que más destaca es un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} deforme y fundido conectado a la cabeza del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g}. Es un misterio que aún funcione, pero más extraño todavía es que el tecnosacerdote no lo haya sustituido ya. ¿Qué clase de influjo impredecible puede tener este implante defectuoso sobre su mente?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre los muchos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g}, lo que más destaca es un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} deforme y fundido conectado a la cabeza del {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g}. Es un misterio que aún funcione, pero más extraño todavía es que el tecnosacerdote no lo haya sustituido ya. ¿Qué clase de influjo impredecible puede tener este implante defectuoso sobre su mente?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parmi toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} se distingue le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} à moitié fondu et déformé qui est directement relié à son crâne. C'est à se demander comment il peut encore fonctionner. Mais le fait même que le technoprêtre ne l'ait pas encore remplacé est un plus grand mystère. Quelle influence peut bien avoir cet implant détérioré sur son esprit ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parmi toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} se distingue le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} à moitié fondu et déformé qui est directement relié à son crâne. C'est à se demander comment il peut encore fonctionner. Mais le fait même que le technoprêtre ne l'ait pas encore remplacé est un plus grand mystère. Quelle influence peut bien avoir cet implant détérioré sur son esprit ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus seinen zahlreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} sticht vor allem der schrecklich verbrannte, deformierte {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} hervor, der mit dem Kopf des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} verbunden ist. Dass er noch funktioniert, ist erstaunlich. Doppelt erstaunlich ist, dass der Techpriester ihn noch nicht ersetzt hat – welchen unberechenbaren Einfluss mag das defekte Implantat wohl auf seinen Geist haben?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus seinen zahlreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} sticht vor allem der schrecklich verbrannte, deformierte {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} hervor, der mit dem Kopf des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriesters{/g} verbunden ist. Dass er noch funktioniert, ist erstaunlich. Doppelt erstaunlich ist, dass der Techpriester ihn noch nicht ersetzt hat – welchen unberechenbaren Einfluss mag das defekte Implantat wohl auf seinen Geist haben?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nice {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyon{/g} arasından asıl göze çarpan; {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip'in{/g} başına bağlı olup korkunç bir şekilde erimiş, hasarlı {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}. Hâlâ çalışıyor olması bile akıl alır gibi değilken bunun asıl iki misli kafa karıştırıcı olan şey, Tekno Rahip'in bu cihazı henüz değiştirmemiş olması. Acaba bu mahvolmuş implantın, zihni üzerinde ne tür öngörülemez etkileri olabilir?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the many {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}, what stands out is the horribly melted, deformed {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} connected to the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s head. How it is working is baffling. What is twice as baffling is that the Tech-Priest hasn't replaced it yet — what unpredictable influence can this ruined implant have on his mind?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nice {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyon{/g} arasından asıl göze çarpan, {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}'in başına bağlı olan ve korkunç bir şekilde erimiş, hasarlı {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}. Hâlâ çalışıyor olması bile akıl alır gibi değil ama bunun asıl iki misli kafa karıştırıcı olan şey, Tekno Rahip'in bu cihazı hâlâ değiştirmemiş olması. Acaba bu mahvolmuş implant, zihnini nasıl önceden kestirilemez şekillerde etkileyebilir?{/n}
